```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

here()
dr_here()
print(here())

dat <- read_csv2(here('/Data/VRTask/Prerating/results_n94.csv'), 
                 skip = 1, 
                 col_names = TRUE)
# 
colnames(dat)[1:6] <- c('nbr', 'ID', 'lang', 'age', 'sex', 'yoEdu') 
dat <- gather(dat, animal, rating, colnames(dat)[7:51])
dat$dimension[grepl('_1', dat$animal)] <- "disgust"
dat$dimension[grepl('_2', dat$animal)] <- "speed"

dat$dimension[is.na(dat$dimension)] <- "threat"



dat$animal <- gsub(c('_1|_2'), '', dat$animal)

thrdat <- dat %>%
  filter(dimension == 'threat') 
bymedian <- with(thrdat, reorder(animal, -rating, mean))
boxplot(rating ~ bymedian, data = dat[dat$dimension == 'threat', ])


disgdat <- dat %>%
  filter(dimension == 'disgust') 
bymedian <- with(disgdat, reorder(animal, -rating, mean))
boxplot(rating ~ bymedian, data = disgdat)

speedgdat <- dat %>%
  filter(dimension == 'speed') 
bymedian <- with(speedgdat, reorder(animal, -rating, mean))
boxplot(rating ~ bymedian, data = speedgdat)



```
